movie.title: The Godfather
movie.description: The aging patriarch transfers control of his crime family to his reluctant son.

movie.title: Dune
movie.description: Paul Atreides leads nomadic tribes in a battle to control the desert planet Arrakis.

movie.title: Blade Runner 2049
movie.description: A young blade runner discovers a secret that could plunge what's left of society into chaos.

movie.title: Parasite
movie.description: A poor family schemes to become employed by a wealthy family by posing as unrelated, highly qualified individuals.

movie.title: The Holdovers
movie.description: A curmudgeonly instructor at a New England prep school is forced to remain on campus during Christmas break to babysit the handful of students with nowhere to go.

movie.title: Fight Club
movie.description: An insomniac office worker and a soap salesman form an underground fight club.

movie.title: Her
movie.description: A lonely writer develops an unlikely relationship with an operating system designed to meet his every need.

movie.title: Manchester by the Sea
movie.description: A depressed uncle is asked to take care of his teenage nephew after the boy's father dies.

movie.title: Your Name.
movie.description: Two teenagers share a profound, magical connection upon discovering they are swapping bodies.

movie.title: Dead Poets Society
movie.description: English teacher John Keating inspires his students to look at poetry with a different perspective of authentic knowledge and feelings.

movie.title: A Man Called Otto
movie.description: Otto is a grump who's given up on life following the loss of his wife and wants to end it all. When a young family moves in nearby, he meets his match in quick-witted Marisol.

movie.title: The Matrix
movie.description: A computer programmer discovers reality as he knows it is actually a simulation.

movie.title: Interstellar
movie.description: A team of explorers travel through a wormhole in space in an attempt to ensure humanity's survival.

movie.title: Everything Everywhere All at Once
movie.description: A woman must connect with alternate versions of herself to prevent a powerful being from destroying the multiverse.

movie.title: Inception
movie.description: A thief enters people's dreams to steal secrets from their subconscious minds.

movie.title: The Shawshank Redemption
movie.description: A banker convicted of murder finds hope and friendship during his time in Shawshank prison.

movie.title: Black Panther: Wakanda Forever
movie.description: Queen Ramonda, Shuri, M'Baku, Okoye and the Dora Milaje fight to protect their nation from intervening world powers after King T'Challa's death.

movie.title: Coraline
movie.description: An adventurous girl finds another world that is a strangely idealized version of her frustrating home, but it has sinister secrets.

movie.title: The Grand Budapest Hotel
movie.description: The adventures of a legendary concierge and his protégé at a famous European hotel.

movie.title: Forrest Gump
movie.description: The presidencies of Kennedy and Johnson through the eyes of an Alabama man with an IQ of 75.

movie.title: Get Out
movie.description: A young African-American visits his white girlfriend's parents for the weekend, where his simmering uneasiness becomes a nightmare.

movie.title: Spirited Away
movie.description: A young girl becomes trapped in a strange new world of spirits and must find a way to free herself and her parents.

movie.title: Isle of Dogs
movie.description: Set in Japan, Isle of Dogs follows a boy's odyssey in search of his lost dog.

movie.title: Little Women
movie.description: Four sisters come of age in America in the aftermath of the Civil War.
